title: Foggy city street with police car and other vehicles

description: The road is a city street with moderate traffic. The ego vehicle is a police car driving slowly in foggy weather. There are other cars on the road, including a black car and a parked truck. The traffic lights are visible but not very clear due to the fog. The weather is foggy and the visibility is low.
reasoning: The police car is driving slowly in the foggy weather to ensure safety. It is following the black car in front of it and maintaining a safe distance. The police car is driving cautiously to avoid any accidents.
